name: Sequence Diagram
advanced_mmd:
%%{init: {"theme":"base","themeVariables":{"fontFamily":"ui-sans-serif,system-ui","primaryColor":"#F6F8FA","primaryBorderColor":"#24292F","lineColor":"#57606A","actorBorder":"#24292F","actorBkg":"#EAEEF2","signalColor":"#1F6FEB","signalTextColor":"#24292F","noteBkgColor":"#FFF8C5","noteBorderColor":"#D4A72C"}}}%%
sequenceDiagram
  title Sequence Diagram (advanced features)
  autonumber

  box Client #E7F5FF
    participant Web as "Web UI"
  end

  box Server #FFF5E6
    participant API
    participant DB as "Orders DB"
  end

  Web->>+API: POST /orders (json)
  API->>+DB: INSERT order
  DB-->>-API: ok

  alt Payment fails
    API-->>Web: 402 Payment Required
  else Success
    API-->>Web: 201 Created\nLocation: /orders/123
  end

  Note right of API: Demonstrates:\n- boxes\n- autonumber\n- activation\n- alt/else\n- themed styling

name: Flowchart Diagram
simple_mmd:
flowchart LR
A[Web App] --> B[API]
B --> C[(Database)]
advanced_mmd:
%%{init: {"theme":"base","themeVariables":{"fontFamily":"ui-sans-serif,system-ui","primaryColor":"#F6F8FA","primaryBorderColor":"#24292F","lineColor":"#57606A"}}}%%
flowchart LR
  %% Subgraphs as "packages"
  subgraph Frontend["Frontend"]
    Web[Web App]
    Admin[Admin Portal]
  end

  subgraph Services["Services"]
    Auth[Auth Service]
    Catalog[Catalog Service]
    Orders[Order Service]
  end

  subgraph Data["Data"]
    ODB[(Orders DB)]
    CDB[(Catalog DB)]
  end

  Web -->|OIDC| Auth
  Web -->|Browse| Catalog
  Web -->|Checkout| Orders
  Admin --> Auth
  Admin --> Orders

  Orders -->|SQL| ODB
  Catalog -->|SQL| CDB

  %% Styling
  classDef frontend fill:#E7F5FF,stroke:#24292F,color:#24292F;
  classDef service fill:#FFF5E6,stroke:#24292F,color:#24292F;
  classDef data fill:#EAFBE7,stroke:#24292F,color:#24292F;

  class Web,Admin frontend;
  class Auth,Catalog,Orders service;
  class ODB,CDB data;

name: Class Diagram
advanced_mmd:
%%{init: {"theme":"base","themeVariables":{"fontFamily":"ui-sans-serif,system-ui","primaryColor":"#F6F8FA","primaryBorderColor":"#24292F","lineColor":"#57606A"}}}%%
classDiagram
  direction LR

  class BaseEntity {
    <<abstract>>
    +UUID id
    +datetime createdAt
  }

  class Customer {
    +string email
    +string name
  }

  class Order {
    +OrderStatus status
    +decimal total
    +addItem(string sku, int qty)
  }

  class OrderItem {
    +string sku
    +int qty
    +decimal unitPrice
  }

  class PaymentProvider {
    <<interface>>
    +authorize(decimal amount) AuthResult
    +capture(string authId) Receipt
  }

  class StripeProvider

  class OrderStatus {
    <<enumeration>>
    Draft
    Submitted
    Paid
    Shipped
    Cancelled
  }

  BaseEntity <|-- Customer
  BaseEntity <|-- Order
  PaymentProvider <|.. StripeProvider

  Customer "1" o-- "*" Order : places
  Order "1" *-- "1..*" OrderItem : contains

name: State Diagram
simple_mmd:
stateDiagram-v2
  [*] --> Idle
  Idle --> Processing: start
  Processing --> Idle: finish
  Processing --> Error: fail
  Error --> Idle: reset
advanced_mmd:
%%{init: {"theme":"base","themeVariables":{"fontFamily":"ui-sans-serif,system-ui","primaryColor":"#F6F8FA","primaryBorderColor":"#24292F","lineColor":"#1F6FEB","noteBkgColor":"#FFF8C5","noteBorderColor":"#D4A72C"}}}%%
stateDiagram-v2
  title State Diagram (advanced features)

  [*] --> Draft

  state Draft {
    [*] --> Editing
    Editing --> Ready: validate ok
    Ready --> Editing: edit
  }

  Draft --> Submitted: submit
  Submitted --> Paid: payment ok
  Submitted --> Cancelled: cancel

  state Paid {
    [*] --> AwaitingFulfillment
    AwaitingFulfillment --> Shipped: fulfill
    Shipped --> Delivered: deliver
  }

  note right of Submitted
    Demonstrates:
    - nested states
    - labeled transitions
    - themed styling
  end note
